She then emigrated to the United States with her parents and her sister when she was 15 years old, and found herself navigating an entirely new life in Los Angeles, where her father made a living first as a musician - or at least trying to be one - and then performing exorcisms and conducting seances with the long-dead and the not-so-long-dead.
